titleStmt.title: Reflections upon Monsieur Des Cartes's Discourse of a method for the well-guiding of reason, and discovery of truth in the sciences. Written by a private pen in French, and translated out of the original manuscript, by J.D.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1625-1693.

notesStmt.note: The epistle dedicatory signed: Jo. Davies.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "1654. Febr. 2."; the second 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "4".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
